answers.answer: Unusual thirst at night and increased appetite can be symptoms of diabetes. I don't know about the other things, but it couldn't hurt to get checked out and that way you will know if there is a problem and stop worrying if there isn't!

question: hi. i am really worried and i hope you can help me. lately ive been really really thirsty, especially during the night. i have a heartburn, so more often, i vomit, but just a little. i have a late period for 3 days now. i am usually regular 28 days. i am eating alot now. ive been reading some of the articles and promised to have a good diet. even though am still scared that i might have diabetes. help me pls.
title: always thirsty and late period
